description:
An earthquake shakes Shinjuku, and all the members of the Shuffle Alliance along with their crews are trapped underground. Rain stumbles upon the Devil Gundam, which is absorbing its Death Army mobile suits.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die ultimative Kraft und das ultimative Böse! Der Aufstieg des Devil Gundams
Surpuissant et démoniaque ! Le Devil Gundam sort de l’ombre
Ultimate Power and Evil! Rise of the Dark Gundam
最強最悪! デビルガンダム現わる
